attributes.action: Stop Northampton residents being financially punished for council spending error
attributes.background:
Northampton residents are being forced to bail out the council, due to the council lending money to toxic projects.

As repayments have not materialised, residents of northampton will be burdened with the repayment. This is imorale.

Resudents may boycott council tax payments from next year.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You could also submit a petition to your local council:

https://www3.northamptonshire.gov.uk/councilservices/council-and-democracy/have-your-say/Pages/petitions.aspx
